quotes: K-Dense Analyst is part of our larger K-Dense platform that can autonomously do original PhD-level research (story coming in ~2 weeks), tackle real drug discovery workflows (story coming next month) and a lot more coming in the next few months.

organizations.name: FutureHouse
quotes: We built a Multi-agent system (K-Dense Analyst) that just beat GPT-5 on BixBench (the open-ended biological analysis benchmark from FutureHouse), achieving 29.2% vs GPT-5's 22.9%.
